description: New York City officials say a laid-off women’s accessories designer fatally shot a former co-worker outside the Empire State Building, then was killed by police in a shootout that wounded nine bystanders.
title: Shooting in Midtown Manhattan
title_page: Shooting in Midtown Manhattan - The New York Times
maintext:
Shooting in Midtown Manhattan
New York City officials say a laid-off women’s accessories designer fatally shot a former co-worker outside the Empire State Building, then was killed by police in a shootout that wounded nine bystanders.
